tweets.text: Shocking indictment of @EnvAgency . No wonder gathering storm of public outrage about polluted and exhausted rivers like the Cam and its chalk streams. @CamLabEF @camfoe @Greenpeace @greenarteries @Feargal_Sharkey @CPRECambs @CamEco_Council https://t.co/z0JZu0U5RP

Why the @EnvAgency are hopeless example 58,743

Anyone want to guess who has been at the very top of the EA during that whole period and who appears incapable of negotiating a proper budget settlement for the agency with government? https://t.co/B6Bmn8T9gx
@MossMo55 @DefraDigital @EnvAgency Thanks Sarah! Going to Government Digital Service to help monitor accessibility on public sector websites. Hope you're well!
@SophieJTankard @slowtheflow_UK @Ragsie123 @rggeo @EnvAgencyYNE @nationaltrust @Calderdale Congratulations Sophie!!  Well deserved!!

COG assisting @Station_50 and @HenfieldFire today. So far 50P1 and 50M1 have attended a road collision where a car lost control due to ice. The EA unit was utilised to clean a large quantity of oil on the roadway. Please take care when driving in cold and icy conditions!

tweets.text: Good news that progress is being made to clear up the pollution coming onto #Lynemouth beach. #greener #cleaner #oceans @EnvAgencyYNE @pow_rebecca https://t.co/5dA67AySmS

The next stage to tackle the historic pollution at #Lynemouth beach is getting underway. 
Ahead of main works, the site's being prepared and an area of non-hazardous material in the upper cliff is being removed to landfill.
Read more >> https://t.co/nIrSPN0IFe
@BAMNuttall https://t.co/SBN0oJBHg4
